trans-unit.target: 在webshop中,你必须继承base.jinja,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: Full Webshop based on Tryton Nereid

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Nereid Webshop
trans-unit.target: Nereid Webshop

trans-unit.source: On pointing the browser to localhost:5000 you should be able to see the home page.
trans-unit.target: 将浏览器指向localhost：5000时，您应该可以看到主页。

trans-unit.source: Set custom favicon by setting icon path in SHOP_FAVICON variable before extending webshop/base.jinja as follows:
trans-unit.target: 在扩展webshop / base.jinja之前，通过在SHOP_FAVICON变量中设置图标路径来设置自定义图标，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Setting this module up is similar to the setup of any other tryton module.
trans-unit.target: 该模块的设置与其他tryton模块的设置类似。

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Create a virtualenv
trans-unit.target: 第1步:创建一个virtualenv

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Clone and Setup the module
trans-unit.target: 第二步:克隆和设置模块

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Setup Database
trans-unit.target: 第三步:设置数据库

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Create an application script
trans-unit.target: 步骤4:创建应用程序脚本

trans-unit.source: Step 5: Production Deployment
trans-unit.target: 步骤5:生产部署

trans-unit.source: Step 6: Customization
trans-unit.target: 步骤6:定制

trans-unit.source: TODO
trans-unit.target: 待办事项

trans-unit.source: The module should now be available on the modules list and can be installed into any database. Setup a website as shown below:
trans-unit.target: 该模块现在应该可以在模块列表中找到,并且可以安装到任何数据库中。建立一个网站,如下图所示。

trans-unit.source: This command would install all the required dependencies for the module to function.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将安装模块运行所需的所有依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: You can now activate the virtualenv
trans-unit.target: 现在您可以激活virtualenv

trans-unit.source: You should now be able to run the development server by running the application using:
trans-unit.target: 现在,您应该能够通过使用运行应用程序来运行开发服务器。

trans-unit.source: You will have to create a guest user for nereid. The guest user would be the user which would be available in the context when there are no users logged into the website.
trans-unit.target: 你必须为nereid创建一个客人用户。客人用户将是在没有用户登录网站时,在上下文中可用的用户。

trans-unit.source: application.py
trans-unit.target: 应用程序.py

trans-unit.source: script which could lauch the application. A reference is provided in the web folder (application-example.py).
trans-unit.target: 可能会破坏应用程序的脚本。Web文件夹（application-example.py）中提供了参考。

trans-unit.source: the DATABASE_NAME which should be the name of the database (from step 3).
trans-unit.target: DATABASE_NAME,应该是数据库的名称(来自步骤3)。

trans-unit.source: the TRYTON_CONFIG which should be the location of the tryton config file.
trans-unit.target: TRYTON_CONFIG应该是tryton配置文件的位置。
